name: Sushi Match
description:
Side-by-side to get the card game card "sushi", adjacent to the top, bottom, left, right, corner, direction.

○ "sushi normally fit"
Four sets of cards in use X13 (52 cards)

○ "according sushi! More"
Use the card 2 times normal.

○ "according sushi forever"
To get the card within the time limit. Card every time you recover to get the card.
